Reviews.Content: stayed two nights overall price excellent location paid night included breakfast right around corner ritz place de vendome surroundings upscale able walk places also close metro room decent parisian decor window opened overlooked street price category maybe rooms better bathrooms strong cigarette smell really bothered us everyone france maybe thats expected breakfast fantastic offered excellent service staff helpful kind would recommend anyone budget one tip check company website de france hotels found best rate hotels look equally nice also great locations

Reviews.Title: “recent visit”

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”

Reviews.Content: boyfriend stayed hotel diplomatic loved walked everywhere rome location hotel especially price great 15 minute walk vatican 5 minutes spanish steps piazza del 30 minutes colosseum great service hotel arrived checked us joy chat helped us italian language skills lacking gave us local recommendations hotel diplomatic also breakfast every morning staff pleasant enjoyed cappuccino every morning standard rooms small well kept shower great quiet really nice took trip florence italy returned rome last night stayed large room hotel diplomatic

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice”
Reviews.Author: sacky
Reviews.Content: absolutely loved diplomatic stayed nov 2009 staff wonderful especially luca room basic great bathroom plenty room everything always clean got back every day think windows opened onto rooftops quiet would leave windows open evening never heard thing two huge closets hang clothes store extras breakfast day great pastries meats cheese best coffee hotel ever ladies attended breakfast room sweet day visit vatican museums realized printed correct left home back hotel asked luca could get internet right away didnt instead us get hotel internet right computer help two us getting email needed printed less 2 minutes vatican worries best super person around front desk staff friendly helpful directions questions calling cabs etc even though vatican side river still piazza navona 10 minutes walking every evening couple great cafes outside door either direction totally loved warm weather would spent time sitting little outdoor area outside breakfast room know would lovely warmer definately back near future

Reviews.Title: “lovely and clean with great location”
Reviews.Author: maidens
Reviews.Content: glad stay diplomatic walking rome way see city unexpected history time close river wonderful recently restored staff great room

Reviews.Title: “Basic”
Reviews.Author: Cumbria72
Reviews.Content: great hotel perfect location sights well within walking distance walk colosseum 30 minute slow walk would highly recommend hotel anyone travelling rome rooms clean staff helpful spoke good english

Reviews.Title: “Overly Satisfied with Modest Accomodations”
Reviews.Author: ladolcevida17
Reviews.Content: returned stay hotel diplomatic start nothing excellent flight states got 9 hotel 10am room ready stored bags us sightseeing nearby came back hour later room ready bags already brought room good size even us standards 3 us room actually double bed 2 one made bed actually wall beds make almost 2 rooms air conditioning adequate made room cool cool would like states 100 everyday room enough make comfortable breakfast morning typical european breakfast cereal breads hotel staff great remembered us every time came left would help us anything needed flight evening stored luggage day us even booked taxi airport us nice bc mercedes air conditioned 1st floor near breakfast room computer use check email things location could better 5 minute walk castle san vatican 510 minutes across bridge main sites never need cab bus also atm right next door convenient close vatican stop hop hop sightseeing tour would definitely stay hotel next time came rome

Reviews.Title: “Great Location”
Reviews.Author: maird
Reviews.Content: returned hotel diplomatic stay last week second time hotel venue excellent 10 minute walk across river spanish steps centre town plus lovely 510 minute walk along river castel st peters hotel exactly looking good three star hotel rooms clean beds comfortable bathroom good size minibar type small fridge put water wine wardrobe good size real hangers actually remove wardrobe result people complained air conditioning spent four days rome 42 degrees agree best aircon system perfectly adequate temperatures im sure everyone else keep shutters day keep air con room lovely temperature end day positive note fact aircon heavy duty means dont wake middle night dry complimentary breakfast simple perfectly good especially selection breads pastries cheeses yoghurts fruit cereals hot cold drinks like breakfast outdoors terrace lovely way start day staff also excellent friendly remembered names booked car us return journey airport 5 euros standard taxi nice lovely airconditioned mercedes give us relaxing return journey would definitely recommend take service hotel reasonably priced approx per night particularly consider includes breakfast would totally recommend hotel everyone delighted definitely return

Reviews.Title: “3 Star Guest House”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: wife planned trip writing reviews hotel nothing special mean good way close centre loud rooms small clean price acceptable tell friends stay looking romantic weekend

Reviews.Title: “Great location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: bit worried saw entrance small rooms great tasteful elegant old world decor lovely bathrooms breakfast super service staff friendly times location saved us bunch transport could walk almost every good tourist spot piazza di il la di trevi piazza navona il san pantheon river 100 meters hotel piazza hotel located houses beautiful building huge bus station right hotel close restaurants banks name shall definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: lezlieb
Reviews.Content: stayed diplomatic 3 nights arrived returned touring area hotel entrance nothing perhaps lively walls art would make appear appealing room quite nice size clean shower excellent bed king adequate considering husband bad back rooms facing street could little noisy hotel situated busy street interior rooms much location centrally located attractions city tour bus stop outside door breakfast could little pricing many hotels would say rome good would stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “great position,would recommend to anyone”
Reviews.Author: janetdono
Reviews.Content: hotel amazing value money good location near st bridge upscale rooms marble bathrooms tub breakfast also bit generous experienced expensive hotels rome

Reviews.Title: “great choice”
Reviews.Author: sweetprimeras
Reviews.Content: read number mixed reviews hotel diplomatic concerns decided keep open mind wasnt disappointed hotels location main feature nearly main sights within walking distance arent bus stop conveniently situated outside hotel entrance arrived early 1130 fairness hadnt expected able check reception desk extremely helpful allowed us store luggage rooms ready told would wait decided take walk around get bearings receptionist kindly provided us map address hotel would able twin room room ensuite much larger expected room came equipped stocked mini bar prices local shops tv although cnn english possibly best air conditioning ever experienced something much appreciated 35 degree august heat breakfast good toast cereals pastries yoghurts fruit rooms made daily towels changed time 5pm road outside empty experience traffic stayed 4 nights enjoyable stay couldnt find fault anything would definitly recommend hotel diplomatic top tips pre book excursions queues huge used offer several others guides speak excellent english provided hear crowds buy tour bus boat ticket purchased either bus one 24 great way see sights hop stops take bus colosseum stops right outside tickets purchased 1 eur 75 minutes warned trying get bus back little less simple none seem head right direction tour bus comes handy buses come every 15mins try eat away main attractions side roads along spanish steps reasonable meal soft drinks costing approx 22 euros comparison restaurant near vatican charged 45 euros practically
